trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Emmaus
There were no other sightings in Emmaus on or around February 10th 1991
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details i lived at 928 chestnut street it was the first or second week of febuary 1991 and i went out side to the feild between the alley and the railroad tracks to "walk" our new puppy. while waiting, i stood and stared at the crystal clear sky and was amazed at the amount of stars that night. i was facing to the south and was looking up at about 60 degrees when a large black triangle aproached from my right and progressively started blocking out stars, floating silently and slowly from right to left. in my opinion the object had to be about 1000 feet in the sky(there is a mountain range to the southeast ...in the direction of the thing traveling. my home was about onequarter mile from the base of the mountain)so at that hight and in that perspective the object was about 2 or 3 football feilds long and narrower than it was long.. maybe 2to 1 ratio. The whole episode lasted less than 5 minutes... scared the hell out of me .... and has been on my mind for far to many years. thank you for your interest, jay
Summary: Triangle shape blocked out the night sky.
